data.eml:eml: Electrogena brulini sp. nov. and E. vipavensis Zurwerra & Tomka, 1986 syn. nov. revealed by integrative taxonomy of E. gridellii (Grandi, 1953) (Ephemeroptera: Heptageniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wagner, Andre, Vuataz, Laurent, Sartori, Michel (2017): Electrogena brulini sp. nov. and E. vipavensis Zurwerra & Tomka, 1986 syn. nov. revealed by integrative taxonomy of E. gridellii (Grandi, 1953) (Ephemeroptera: Heptageniidae). Zootaxa 4362 (3): 359-384, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4362.3.3
